channel.title: networkx on Some Title
channel.description: Recent content in networkx on Some Title

item.title: Voice actor network analysis (using word2vec and networkx) (2/2)
item.description: ### Rough flow of analysis introduced this time ・Create and visualize female voice actor network ・Try clustering similar voice actors using network information. ・Visualize the categorized results with Cytoscape Hi, this is bamboo-nova. Qiita mainly throws in material analysis. If you are interested in my serious stories and analysis, please refer to this (evacuation site) Bamboo shoot blog Also, I have put the source code that summarizes the series of steps so far on Github, so please refer to it if you like!

item.title: You can try it with copy and paste! Let's draw a cool network diagram with Python's networkx
item.description: ## Let's draw a network diagram with networkx that can draw a cool network diagram during winter vacation Do you all have a good winter vacation? Our company has been taking a day off from 28th to 5th and is really thankful to the mice. But I think engineers should refrain from Mac refugees and improve their skills at such times. Today we will introduce a library called networkx that can draw network diagrams.
